Element definition: Unique international identifier of the monitoring site.
Specification of whether the monitoring site is a WFD monitoring site ('euMonitoringSiteCode') or not ('eionetMonitoringSiteCode').
Value definitions:
eionetMonitoringSiteCode: EIONET identifier;
euMonitoringSiteCode: WFD identifier

Element definition: Unique international identifier of the water body being monitored.
Specification of whether the water body is a WFD water body ('euGroundwaterBodyCode' or 'euSurfaceWaterBodyCode') or not ('eionetGroundwaterBodyCode' or 'eionetSurfaceWaterBodyCode').
Information about the sensitivity and confidentiality status of the monitoring site location.
Value definitions:
F: Free for publication;
N: Not for publication

Element definition: Longitude of the monitoring site. It is not provided for monitoring sites where publication is restricted.
Latitude of the monitoring site. It is not provided for monitoring sites where publication is restricted.
